body: Aasimars are defined by class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. Aasimars have the following racial traits.
name: Aasimar

sections.body: Aasimars have a base speed of 30 feet.
sections.name: Normal Speed

sections.body: Aasimars can see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Aasimars have a +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy and Perception checks.
sections.name: Skilled

sections.body: Aasimars can use daylight once per day as a spell-like ability (caster level equals the aasimar's class level).
sections.name: Spell-Like Ability

sections.body: Aasimars have acid resistance 5, cold resistance 5, and electricity resistance 5.
sections.name: Celestial Resistance

sections.body: Aasimars begin play speaking Common and Celestial. Aasimars with high Intelligence scores can choose any of the following bonus languages: Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Halfling, and Sylvan.
sections.name: Languages
